amendatorysection.catchline: Costs; Pseudorabies Control Cash Fund; created.
amendatorysection.para: The department may assess and collect costs for services provided and expenses incurred pursuant to its responsibilities under the Pseudorabies Control and Eradication Act. All costs assessed and collected pursuant to this section shall be remitted to the State Treasurer. The State Treasurer shall credit such costs to the Pseudorabies Control Cash Fund which is hereby created.
